name: Neon Mountain TV 2
description:
N E O N M O U N T A I N T V 2

Our entry for TOJAM11: the three-day Toronto Game Jam. We constructed another green screen, discovered some great Portuguese bands, and again learned absolutely nothing new about ourselves in the process. Definitely another successful jam.

Enjoy - and remember: Scores mean nothing.

Check out the first Neon Mountain TV here!

Controls:

  • WASD / Arrow Keys / Left Control Stick - Does stuff
  • Left Click / A Button - Does even more stuff
